item.title: The Amazon Way
item.description: Amazing interview. From the scale of Amazon’s operations, to the forward thinking ideas (some very sci-fi), and just the general philosophy. Jeff Bezos: Jeff Bezos: The long term approach is rare enough that it means you’re not competing against very many companies. ‘Cause most companies wanna see a return on investment in, you know, one, two, three years. Charlie Rose: You donâ€™t care about that? Jeff Bezos: I care, but I’m willing for it to be five, six, seven years.
